alert.note: Alert for Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms spreading into the old Boundary Fire burn scar along the Middle Fork of the Salmon River through 730 PM MDT... At 558 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms 25 miles northwest of Stanley, moving northeast at 15 mph into the Boundary Fire burn scar. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy rainfall and gusty winds to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Moderate to heavy rainfall may trigger debris flows along the Middle Fork of the Salmon River this evening in an area with little to no radar coverage. Locations impacted include... Loon Creek Airport, Dagger Falls, and Seafoam Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider moving your shelter to higher ground. This storm may intensify, so be certain to watch for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin
